name: Figure of a Knight
editor_name: 启动项用-占卜结果-对话结果00
desc: Reputation with the Union from quests + 25%, and popularity rate of other factions from quests - 10%

name: Omen of the Strength
desc: At the beginning of the act, if there are no other allies within <style=red>2</style> tiles around, grants yourself [<sprite=2>Crit IV] for <style=red>1</style> turn.

name: Omen of the Chariot
desc: Maximum Range increases by <style=red>2</style> tiles by using [Charge] skill. If moves in a straight line before attack (at least one tile), the target will be knocked back <style=red>1</style> tile after attacking.

name: Omen of the Emperor
desc: After dealing DMG out of their turn, all skill cooldown decreases by <style=red>3</style> turns and restores <style=green>1</style> point of NRG. Each round can only active <style=red>1</style> time.

name: Omen of the Empress
desc: When attack [Non-restraint Attribute] character, decreases DMG by <style=red>10%</style>. When attack [Restraint Attribute] character, increases Attack by <style=red>20%</style>.

name: Omen of the Judgment
desc: Increases DMG by <style=red>30%</style> when dealing range attack or skills that need preparation. Increases exta DMG by <style=red>30%</style> when the conditions meet at the same time.

name: Omen of the Hermit
desc: If the target is never injured, deals <style=red>80%</style> ATK and [AoE Damage] of MATK to all enemies a target range of <style=red>2</style> tiles after single-target healing. If the Healing skill is [instant], then deals DMG by half.

name: Omen of the Death
desc: Inflicts 2 radom [level 2 debuffs] on the target for 2 round DMG is dealt with [ranged]. When you have 5 or more [debuffs], grants yourself [<sprite=3>Move 1] for <style=green>1</style> round.

name: Omen of the Devil
desc: If no DMG is dealed in the move, grants [Physical Shield] with <style=red>10%</style> HP for <style=red>1</style> turn after the move. Deals DMG increased by <style=red>20%</style> when obtaining the [shield].

name: Omen of the High Priestess
desc: After [assisting cover], [dodge] or [block], grants [<sprite=2>Critical 5] and [Weaken Armor Piercing] for <style=green>1</style> round.

name: Omen of the Tower
desc: Restores extra <style=green>2</style> points of NRG after [dodge], [block], or [strike back].

name: Omen of the World
desc: Increases the ATK and DEF attributes of all allied units.

name: Fierce Edge
editor_name: 碎片永久_粉碎者攻击强化
desc: Increases the ATK of all allied <Breaker> units by <style=red>5%</style>.

name: Indomitable Will

desc: Increases the HP of all allied <Breaker> units by <style=red>5%</style>.

name: Precision Spear
editor_name: 碎片永久_防御者攻击强化
desc: Increases the Crit Chance of all allied <Seeker> units by <style=red>8%</style>.

name: Surprise Attack
editor_name: 碎片永久_防御者防御强化
desc: Increases the Crit DMG of all allied <Seeker> units by <style=red>8%</style>.

name: Defender's Barrier
editor_name: 碎片永久_突袭者攻击强化
desc: Increases the DEF of all allied <Defender> units by <style=red>10%</style>.

name: Robust Body
editor_name: 碎片永久_突袭者防御强化
desc: Increases the HP of all allied <Defender> units by <style=red>5%</style>.

name: Wreaking Havoc
editor_name: 碎片永久_毁灭者攻击强化
desc: Increases the ATK of all allied <Destroyer> units by <style=red>5%</style>.

name: Stalwart Shield
editor_name: 碎片永久_毁灭者防御强化
desc: Increases the DEF of all allied <Destroyer> units by <style=red>10%</style>.

name: Heal of Resuscitation
editor_name: 碎片永久_守望者攻击强化
desc: Increases the healing done by all allied <Watcher> units by <style=green>10%</style>.

name: Fresh Air
editor_name: 碎片永久_守望者防御强化
desc: Increases the ATK and DEF of all allied <Watcher> units by <style=red>3%</style>.

name: Mob Mentality
desc: For all allies in battle, DMG is increased by <style=red>5%</style>.

name: Solid Ground
desc: Decreases the damage taken by all allied units by <style=red>5%</style>.

name: Breaker's Smite
desc: All allied <Breaker> units ignore <style=red>20%</style> of the target's DEF when attacking.

name: Breaker's Spirit
desc: Increases the damage dealt by all allied <Breaker> units outside their turn by <style=red>20%</style>.

name: Seeker's Mark
desc: Increases the Crit Chance of all allied <Seeker> units by <style=red>10%</style>.

name: Seeker's Blade
desc: All allied <Seeker> units gain <style=green>10%</style> [<style=C4>Life Steal</style>] upon dealing a critical hit.

name: Defender's Force
desc: Increases Attack by <style=red>10%</style> for all allied <Defender> with [shield].

name: Defender's Aegis
desc: Increases the [shield value] of all allied <Defender> units by <style=red>20%</style> upon receiving a [shield].

name: Destroyer's Rage
desc: Increases the ATK of all allied <Destroyer> units by <style=red>8%</style>.

name: Destroyer's Endurance
desc: Increases the HP of all allied <Destroyer> units by <style=red>10%</style>.

name: Watcher's Patience
desc: All allied <Watcher> units dispel <style=red>2</style> [<style=C4>debuff</style>s] on the target when attacking.

name: Watcher's Forgiveness
desc: All allied <Watcher> units dispel <style=red>2</style> [debuffs] on the target when using skills on allies.

name: Determination
desc: Increases the [shield value] of all allied units by <style=red>10%</style> upon receiving a [shield].

name: Perseverance
desc: Increases the HP of all allied units by <style=green>5%</style>.

name: Concentration
desc: Increases the Crit Chance of all allied units by <style=red>5%</style>.

name: Contempt
desc: Increases the damage dealt by all allied units by <style=red>10%</style> when outside their turn.

name: Vigilence
desc: Increases the ATK of all allied <Seeker> units by <style=red>5%</style>.
